text: Lachowicz is a Polish surname. Notable people include: * Dionisio Lachovicz (born 1946), Brazilian Ukrainian Greek-Catholic hierarch * Al Lachowicz (born 1960), an American former Major League Baseball pitcher * Colleen Lachowicz (1964), an American politician and social worker from Maine * Jacek Lachowicz (born 1972), a Polish musician, author and producer * Rachel Lachowicz (born 1964), an American artist based in Los Angeles, California * Robert Lachowicz (born 1990), an English professional ice hockey left winger Category:Surnames of Polish origin Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Lachowicz
